name: rattled

effect.x_y: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

flavor_text.x_y: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed stat.
